title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: If student explains the potential energy of the entire system decreases beginning at t = 0 because water leaks from the bucket, and makes no incorrect statement, they earn 1 out of 3 points.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Because the prompt says “explain,” a student cannot earn all five points without writing any prose. If equations are written that satisfy all five points, but no prose is provided, a maximum of 4 points are earned.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes three of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes four of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.
